mapper.select:
select
from wuzibu where zhanghao = #{zhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from wuzibu where 1=1 and zhanghao like concat('%',#{zhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and mima like concat('%',#{mima,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and bumenmingcheng like concat('%',#{bumenmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and gangwei like concat('%',#{gangwei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and lianxidianhua like concat('%',#{lianxidianhua,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shouji like concat('%',#{shouji,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and jiatingdizhi like concat('%',#{jiatingdizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from wuzibu where 1=1
and zhanghao =#{zhanghao}

select from wuzibu where 1=1 and zhanghao like concat('%',#{zhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and mima like concat('%',#{mima,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and bumenmingcheng like concat('%',#{bumenmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and gangwei like concat('%',#{gangwei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and lianxidianhua like concat('%',#{lianxidianhua,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shouji like concat('%',#{shouji,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and jiatingdizhi like concat('%',#{jiatingdizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into wuzibu
id,
zhanghao, mima, xingming, bumenmingcheng, gangwei, lianxidianhua, shouji, jiatingdizhi,
addtime,

#{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update wuzibu
zhanghao = #{zhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mima = #{mima,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xingming = #{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bumenmingcheng = #{bumenmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gangwei = #{gangwei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lianxidianhua = #{lianxidianhua,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shouji = #{shouji,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jiatingdizhi = #{jiatingdizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wuzibu set zhanghao = #{zhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},mima = #{mima,jdbcType=VARCHAR},xingming = #{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},bumenmingcheng = #{bumenmingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},gangwei = #{gangwei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},lianxidianhua = #{lianxidianhua,jdbcType=VARCHAR},shouji = #{shouji,jdbcType=VARCHAR},jiatingdizhi = #{jiatingdizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
